rows.label: qst710801_msg0001
rows.name:
That man... I wonder where
he's wandering off to...

rows.label: qst710801_msg0002
rows.name: Oh, I'm sorry. Are you a customer?

rows.label: qst710801_msg0003
rows.name:
If you're here for the shop to reopen,
could you wait a little longer?

rows.label: qst710801_msg0004
rows.name:
My husband is missing...
no, that's not it. He went
to get some fish...

rows.label: qst710801_msg0005
rows.name:
You remember when that Heaven's Holy
Grail attacked and most of the fish
in this city were wiped out?

rows.label: qst710801_msg0006
rows.name:
At that time, my husband said,
"I'll go get the fish myself!"
and went off somewhere...

rows.label: qst710801_msg0007
rows.name: And he hasn't come back since.

rows.label: qst710801_msg0008
rows.name:
The fish are back in the city and at
the farms, so I want to reopen the
shop, but my husband is still gone...

rows.label: qst710801_msg0009
rows.name:
But there are a lot of monsters
outside... and I can't just
leave the shop and this city.

rows.label: qst710801_msg0010
rows.name:
I feel bad asking a customer
to do this, but...

rows.label: qst710801_msg0011
rows.name:
Could you find my husband and tell
him to come back to the capital?

rows.label: qst710801_msg0012
rows.name:
My husband once said he wanted to
try and catch a big one at Coolley
Lake in Gula, so he might be there.

rows.label: qst710801_msg0013
rows.name:
Please, I'm counting
on you to find him.
